tool_description: Generate PDFs, Images, and more from HTML and URLs

api_list.name: Convert URL to Image
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert any publicly accessible URL into an image.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the webpage to convert to an image.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: The maximum time to wait for the request in milliseconds.

api_list.name: Convert HTML to Image
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert HTML content into an image.

api_list.name: Convert HTML to PDF
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert HTML content into a PDF document.

api_list.name: Convert URL to PDF
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert any publicly accessible URL into a PDF document.
